content: A strangely honest, and at the same time, ironic article. Unsure of how to feel about it — but thank you, Fabricio, for being mostly transparent. Very unfortunate when people don’t realize they’re being sold to though. Content marketing has become an annoying but critical trend for many branding purposes. Seems like few things are written for fun or general information sharing now that clicks matter more than enjoyment or usefulness. Hard to resist the allure of advertising revenue.
